website_summaries.verdict: An affordable table with a combination of some nice features and a few durability concerns.
pros: A folding beer pong table at a decent price
Surface finish wipes clean with minimal effort
Like other tables by the brand, it comes with its own bottle opener that comes in handy when partiers are ready for more beer
cons: Decals tend to peel over time

customer_reviews.title: Shipping damaged, logo not straight, ball holder fell off, Bad!
customer_reviews.text: Just terrible! This is my 2nd order. First one came in damaged. Returned and ordered another and the second one came in damaged! The logo wasnt even on straight. The pong balls are held by a pool noodle and double sided tape and that was off when i opened it. Even amazon tried to cover up some box damage by outting the shipping sticker over the damaged part of the box! I would give this zero stars if i could. I ordered other brand before and they were amazing but this brand is garbage! Do not buy!
customer_reviews.author: justin

customer_reviews.title: Good table if you can be gentle with it
customer_reviews.text: Not that sturdy, but if you’re not too rough with it it’ll last a decent amount of time. My friends and I have had it for about 3 months and so far so good. It’s relatively easy to fold once you get the hang of it and easy to carry. There’s a bottle opener attached to the table, but it’s not really sturdy enough to use. Overall, I would recommend this table only if you can be gentle and not too crazy with bumping into it and diving on it for roll backs. Otherwise, I would recommend trying to find a sturdier table.
customer_reviews.author: Theo

customer_reviews.title: Good enough but not as good as I was hoping.
customer_reviews.text: The surface is very flimsy compared to an official BP table. A lot less reactive and requires more energy than my other table to get the same height or distance on a bounce. There is an audible diferrence on impact vs my official table.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Reedy

customer_reviews.title: Solid table
customer_reviews.text: Run a bar and we are always cycling through tables for many reasons. As well made as any table we have had. It wont last forever but i will buy again if still available.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Bad decals
customer_reviews.text: We had really high hopes for this table after reading all the good reviews but we were super disappointed. The first one we ordered had awful quality decals. The sticker didn't even reach the metal lining in some places, leaving white gaps between the decal and the metal frame. We requested a replacement and it was even worse. The decals were peeling away from the corners all over and the gaps were very noticeable. I would not recommend this table to anyone that is looking for good quality.
customer_reviews.author: chelseaka

customer_reviews.title: PartyPong Tables is the place to shop for all things Beer Pong!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a beer pong table for my son’s birthday and was delighted with service and product provided by PartyPong Tables. The table was delivered shortly after I ordered it and received a personal note from the company’s owner, Adam. The table is a tad low, but proved the perfect height when set over our jacuzzi. It was a great addition to the birthday party with beer pong above and people enjoying the jacuzzi below. I highly recommend PartyPong Tables!
customer_reviews.author: Anne Youngblood

customer_reviews.title: the table looks great and plays well
customer_reviews.text: The table is a little dented in places, but still opens flat and doesn't affect game play. The collapsible legs have a plastic piece on the end of them that fits inside the rest of the legs. If you purchase this, take the legs out and bang in that piece really well so it doesn't come out. As it stands, I now have to try to get that piece out because in its current condition, that leg won't collapse all the way and has to be taken out and just lain inside when the table is folded up. Other than that, the table looks great and plays well.
customer_reviews.author: Philip

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer
customer_reviews.text: I took a BIG gamble on buying cuz I couldnt find any reviews for THIS table but the reviews for the other ones all read about flimsy legs or decal pealing, etc... well I bought this for my hubby for valentines day and we both love it!! Its not super flimsy and is pretty sturdy. Worth the buy for sure! Currently breaking it in haha
customer_reviews.author: Maria Biller

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Pong Table and Arrived Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Not only did this product come damaged (one of the surfaces has a gash in it, but the surface of the table itself is terrible at bouncing the pong balls. The surface just doesn't seem to be hard, thick, and rigid enough to bounce the balls, and instead absorb much of the impact, so you have to use twice the strength to bounce compared to a normal hard surface. I'm am returning this product and getting a simple Costco 8' folding table instead.
customer_reviews.author: John Marchetti

customer_reviews.title: Portable but flimsy
customer_reviews.text: The product will only last one season. It’s very portable but NOT sturdy! The legs are very thin aluminum like material and bend upon me trying to fold it back up. When opened for play, it wiggles... A LOT.
customer_reviews.author: BUDSBARANDGRILL

customer_reviews.title: Sensitive to liquid
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend this product. After playing it 1 time the table has very visible signs of water/beer damage. My guess is excess water from splashing/cleaning got under the metal and made the table welt on the edges. It's a beer pong table guys it shouldn't be so sensitive to liquid. To the manufacturer may I suggest applying a thin layer of caulking to the metal edges to make sure this doesn't happen.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren S.

customer_reviews.title: I got a great deal on this from Amazon Warehouse
customer_reviews.text: I got a great deal on this from Amazon Warehouse. I wouldn't pay the full price for it new - it's 8 feet long but it's very short (like, top of the knee cap height) so makes for an awkward throwing angle unless you squat down. It folds up and is very light so it's easy to carry. If your drunk friend ever falls on it though, I seriously doubt you'd be able to use it again.
customer_reviews.author: timmayyyyy

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I Needed
customer_reviews.text: This beer pong table is not very sturdy but its extremely portable and works perfect for a tailgate party.
customer_reviews.author: E. Horvath

customer_reviews.title: Great Table At A Reasonable Price
customer_reviews.text: This was cheaper than other BP tables on line but it looks and feel great. Used it a couple of times and it's still good. Will update in the future if anything happens.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: not what I expected for the money!
customer_reviews.text: This is the table I ordered and it is simply a "skin" so to speak, stuck over a table that looks like a football field. It is poor quality and not as this is advertised. The football field can be seen through the stuck on "skin" and the "skin" is bubbling up off the table. I would not recommend this table. Update 9/10/16: The top skin was eventually taken off due to the bubbling and this is what has now happened to to football field sticker/skin
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: It's easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Bought this over 2 years ago for my husbands birthday, and to this day it holds up really well. It's easy to put together, or take down and store for the next time it is to be used. It is very easy to maintain and clean. In the 2.5 years (approximately) we have owned this, one move and countless trips elsewhere it was definitely a purchase I haven't regretted.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte

customer_reviews.title: Get for a good time
customer_reviews.text: Bought this table when drunk a few months ago because my friends were complaining of playing beer pong on my dining room table. Thankfully this was a good purchase. The table is sturdy and easy to put up. The bottle opener does seem weak though and isn't something we use much. The ball holder underneath is pretty handy, however the balls it comes with are pretty cheap and don't bounce well (have to have good balls for those bounce shots ;)). For the price though I would highly recommend, it won't disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina F

customer_reviews.title: People asked where I bought and I said amazon!
customer_reviews.text: Alil shaky but worth it. Wish it could come up a little higher even after adjusting it to the tallest height. But it’s soo much fun to use and beer pong is made easier than a regular long table. My friends have purchased their own as well.
customer_reviews.author: Annie A.

customer_reviews.title: fun
customer_reviews.text: This was an awesome birthday present for my husband. First time many of us hav played beer pong. It was the first time anyone here saw an official beer pong table. It has beautiful color, cleans well, repels liquids well. Came in within time said. I feel the table should come with some basic rules, due to most of us have never played and the others argue about their rules. Otherwise, this was an awesome gift and enjoyable for all (drinkers and non drinkers).
customer_reviews.author: Pammer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed customer
customer_reviews.text: When ordering this table I read the Description and it said large imperfection, I assumed a large scratch along the table or the metal to be fairly bent, NO the entire one panel is cracked, I’m very upset with this purchase! It should have stated that it was broken not imperfected they are two completely different things
customer_reviews.author: Dog momma 13

customer_reviews.title: For the Beirut player on the go
customer_reviews.text: I love playing Beirut whether it includes beer or no it's just a fun game to play with friends. The downside is that a full size table is hard to move from place to place or even set up at your own gathering. That's where this table came in handy. It's collapsible to the size of a large briefcase and can go with you nearly anywhere and as long as you have the space to lay out an 8 foot table then you have enough space to play a great game of Beirut on a sturdy table with good bounce and a nice layout for your cups.
customer_reviews.author: BattleD4d

customer_reviews.title: great Table, get ready to impress people!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome table very sturdy and very cool to have in a college apartment. Spills come very easily off the table . The only reason i am giving this 4 stars is because on the table one corner, when folding it up, sticks out a little more than the rest of the table and because of it it scratched my wood floor. Its not a big deal though cause now i just have someone give me a hand when folding it up.
customer_reviews.author: David Heinisch

customer_reviews.title: Worth the lower price
customer_reviews.text: Easy to fold and carry off. Size is easy to make it slide away somewhere
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice table!
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was very fast, the table arrived much sooner than expected! The table works well, it's very functional, easy to clean, easy to fold and store, and it's a good height and length. My only complaint (which is why it received 4 stars) is that there's a fairly large crack in the bottom of the table. The crack doesn't go through and you can't tell from the top playing surface (which is why I decided not to go through the hassle of returning it). Otherwise, it's a good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Briana Tate

customer_reviews.title: Not the most sturdy, but worked well enough
customer_reviews.text: Came with dents in it and the metal parts scratch everything up (including the bumper of my new car) but the dents didn't really impact the use of the table. Not the most sturdy, but worked well enough. The cup holder things that come with it are cool, but make the spacing weird so we don't use them.
customer_reviews.author: Becks

customer_reviews.title: Tables great graphics not so much
customer_reviews.text: The table itself is awesome , but the graphics on it look similar unfortunately poor designs . I ordered the angel and devil design .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't recommend. Spend a little more and get a higher ...
customer_reviews.text: Have had it a month, the vinyl printed top is already falling off and warping. The joints on the side are becoming detached. Have only played on it a few times. Wouldn't recommend. Spend a little more and get a higher quality one.
customer_reviews.author: tormz

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This table is amazing! It came super fast, and how it was described. The table is very sturdy and seems to be made from quality material. It's a little low (About hip level) but it allows for some fun play. The paint went on nicely (See picture), and it's easy to trace out your designs on it. Folds up nicely for storage and opens up pretty easy. It's everything I wanted in a blank beer pong table plus more!
customer_reviews.author: Average

customer_reviews.title: "Dude, your beer pong table has a Tri-Force!"
customer_reviews.text: I bought this the day before a party with overnight, got here in time for the party! Great table, right height, bottle opener works and is a cool feature. I'm a gamer and when I saw the cup area looked like a Tri-Force I had to get it. The table feels sturdy and the finish has stood up well after a few uses. To keep this product new looking you should not let liquid sit on the surface for long periods of time. Also I see a lot of people saying the bottle opener is "flimsy", just tighten it up with a screw driver and it's perfectly useful.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Altman

customer_reviews.title: Dont normally leave feedback
customer_reviews.text: I was a great anniversary gift for my boyfriend. POSITIVE The legs are adjustable and comes with extra ping pong balls and has a nice sturdy frame that is collapsible. Best price I've seen and comes with bottle opener which is NOT crappy. NEGATIVE The supposed pong holder is just a piece of foam. Great table just rememeber to wipe water/beer off of table or it will swell, still works fine but you can tell that underneath the top is carboard. Overall a great table.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Super flimsy top gets water damaged easily
customer_reviews.text: Super flimsy top gets water damaged easily. Metal frame is good though and it has gotten tons of usage and still holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but vinyl was slightly bubbled and peels over time
customer_reviews.text: Really like the pattern of the tabletop (i got the marijuana themed one) but it has some bubbles. Also, after having water and beer spill on it over the past 6 months or so there is some minor peeling around the edges of the frame. The vinyl isn't adhered the greatest but overall I am still happy with my purchase. I don't think there are any problems with the non-vinyl ones but those with patterns are probably going to have some minor flaws.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre
customer_reviews.text: The table is of legal size and the style is pretty cool. However, the table is lower to the ground than normal pong tables. The "ball holder" that is attached the underside is cheap - Just Styrofoam holding the balls in place. It's pretty cool to have - Just not as nice as I hoped!
customer_reviews.author: M. Park

customer_reviews.title: Cool, but has it's downsides
customer_reviews.text: Overall, it's ok. The balls don't bounce as well as they do on a regular ping pong table. The table is a little unstable, but it works.
customer_reviews.author: Seb

customer_reviews.title: Damaged but seems nice otherwise
customer_reviews.text: Everything seems great, nice size nice height, however one of the four panels had cracks in it when we removed it from the box. I'm worried this will affect its longevity. See picture.
customer_reviews.author: Rick holcker

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy material
customer_reviews.text: pretty easy to fold once I figured it out. The material is very flimsy, I'm afraid it will bend or break. I will not buy another one. I will keep this but wont be surprised if it is broken soon. Handle with care.
customer_reviews.author: Tailgate Extreme

customer_reviews.title: At the risk of sounding like a stereotypical college student
customer_reviews.text: At the risk of sounding like a stereotypical college student, I love this table. Small enough to fit well in an apartment, yet long enough so that games aren't comically easy. My apartment uses it all the time, and the fact that the ping pong balls have a storage spot in the table should not be overlooked: ping pong balls are really easy to lose otherwise. Also very easy to close up and transport. Overall, a great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Wilford

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to the game area!
customer_reviews.text: Heavy and durable! I like how the legs extend. Very easy to set up and break down. Convenient to travel with! It's going to be a great addition to the home as well as the outdoors! I see many pong camping adventures! The only obvious downfall: The "ball holder" isn't the greatest (just soft styrofoam) but it does its job.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice table, well packaged for shipping. Top is not a cheap sticker like other brands. Bottle opener on the side is a nice bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Ganzer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product, exactly as described, it's longer than I expected which is not a problem. Ordered it last minute for Christmas and didn't expect it to arrive in time but somehow the seller got it there before the expected ship date on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: R. Long

customer_reviews.title: It does the trick
customer_reviews.text: I really like this table, its so much better than the plywood we used to use!! However, this is my second table because the first night we used it, we didnt realize you had to wipe it down before passing out! All the liquid on the table got under the laminate and it completely bubbled up. We returned it and they sent a new one right away. I was very pleased with the quick exchange and now that I know to keep it dry, its pretty perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Wisniewski

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome. Easy to set up and travel with
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome. Easy to set up and travel with. We have a blast with these things. Durable, unless your drunk friend falls on it. Then it's like a normal small table subject to drunken damage. Still a great buy. And conveniently here on amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Driggs

customer_reviews.title: Built to last!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this table for a few years now and it's still going great. The decals have not came off or been affected from any liquid substance that has been spilled on. I love how portable and small it is when it is folded. Makes it much easier to take it from place to place. Highly recommend this table guys!!
customer_reviews.author: Darwin

customer_reviews.title: having this super light weight table is perfect
customer_reviews.text: After having a handmade pong table, that weighs over 60 lbs, and is too difficult to set up alone, having this super light weight table is perfect. I do wish it was a bit taller. Love the colors as well.
customer_reviews.author: MamaManda1025

customer_reviews.title: Good quality....but...
customer_reviews.text: This is a very cool and sturdy table. Comes exactly as advertised....however my knock is that it should be taller. I am 6' and playing on this table causes back ache. Even with the legs extended to their full length it's still quite short.
customer_reviews.author: ChungFuStereo

customer_reviews.title: The height said to be 30" but it came out ...

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was great until I started to party with people who cared 0 about anyone else's stuff...

customer_reviews.author: Ashley Ellis

customer_reviews.title: relatively cheap/convenient table

Not sure I would trust sitting on it but other than that it's just fine for it's intended use. I've also occasionally thrown a tablecloth over it and used it for other dinner related purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Blue

customer_reviews.title: Love the design...
customer_reviews.text: I love the design, but the stickers started to peel off right away. Everytime we use it we have to press them down. It also was crooked in the middle, so we took it apart and straightened it. Not a big deal, but we expected a more quality for the price. I wouldn't buy one again for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Cris

customer_reviews.title: If you want this table then buy it! Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this 5 years ago & I still use it to this day. Perfect length & height, lightweight & easily collapsable. So many people have taken part in so many epic games on this table. It was a staple in my party house for years.

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: It looks great and it folds easily for storage. The bottle opener on the side has come in handy a few times. 10/10 reccomend.

customer_reviews.title: Holding Strong
customer_reviews.text: Been using it for over 4 years. Yes the bottle opener is a bit flimsy, but heck its stayed on the past 4 years with no problem. Ball holder is a bit flimsy but its holding ping pongs.... they weigh essentially nothing. Decals are coming off and the inner board is warped and risen. But hey... its not like its been used as a beer pong table the last 4 years.

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ever!!

customer_reviews.title: First one had an issue with the leg closing. ...
customer_reviews.text: First one had an issue with the leg closing. Amazon quickly replaced it within a few days. Second one works perfectly. I have no complaints at all. 4 stars since the first one had a small issue.

customer_reviews.title: Nephew is number #1 fan
customer_reviews.text: I brought this item for my nephew in college for his birthday, and he loves it. In fact he Still using it until this day. He says he loves everything about it. The size. The design Everything. Thank you so much for making his the birthday the best day ever.

customer_reviews.title: Honestly this table should be a little cheaper, but ...

customer_reviews.title: Fun table but not made we'll

customer_reviews.text: Boom beer pong in effect basic table worked great at our brewery . black lotus beer dot com . Enjoyed good afternoon of beer fleet activities with our award winning beer

customer_reviews.title: Nice table!
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this table for a couple months now... It works as it is supposed to, everything fits together correctly and opens and closes properly. customer_reviews.title: Coolest Beer Pong Table Anywhere
customer_reviews.text: I had been eyeing this table for a several weeks before I finally decided to order it.
